abstract.t: This document defines how to transport network subscriptions and event messages on top of the Network Configuration protocol (NETCONF). This includes the full set of RPCs, subscription state changes, and message payloads needing asynchronous delivery. The capabilities and operations defined in this document used in conjunction with [subscribe] are intended to obsolete [RFC5277]. In addition, the capabilities within those two documents along with [yang-push] are intended to enable an extract of a YANG datastore on a remote device.
